original_text: Now after the death of Jehoiada the princes of Judah came and paid homage to the king. Then the king listened to them.
korean_text: 여호야다가 죽은 후에 유다 방백들이 와서 왕에게 절하매 왕이 그들의 말을 듣고

sentences.original_text: Now after the death of Jehoiada
and paid homage to the king.
Then the king listened to them.
